title: Fellow cute gift enthusiasts, how much would you pay for paintings like these? (For self or gifting)
selftext:
I'm having a hard time coming up with a price that is reasonable for me and buyer as well. Painting comes with an easel/stand.

**Note- these are not my paintings, all credits to original artists. I'm just using them as a reference.
comments:
Approx 33 a piece? That's the cost of plain canvas alone without an easel. 

Not reasonable for me at all, definitely for the buyer haha 
Thanks anyway :)
At least 250 for the smallest one.
